PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-05712004-05-05PTB,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Wheat Board Act
PrecisAuthority for THE CANADIAN WHEAT BOARD (a) to adjust its accounts, as of December 31, 2003, by transferring the undistributed balance of funds in the 1996-1997 pool accounts for amber durum wheat and designated barley to a separate account; and (b) to pay to producers, out of that account, the amount to which they are entitled.
AttachmentsAttachment
